ProjectTitle: Unravelling European Governmental Venture Capital Funds: investment patterns, innovation and brain drain.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 10/04/2024 [REDACTED] to make data available for reuse it may be easier to to use a data repository e.g. KU [REDACTED] RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr), you can share data openly or apply access restrictions and only grant access upon request. [REDACTED] a data repository your dataset will get a persistent identifier (in RDR a DOI) that you can refer to in your publication, and your dataset is automatically registered in [REDACTED] so it appears on your publication list. [REDACTED] also https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
